line_1: Thus he an Age runs o'er betwixt the Porch
line_2: Of his Friend's House, and the adjacent Church

line_1: Lo! Discord enters at the sacred porch,
line_2: Ev'n at the hallow'd lamps she lights her torch,

line_1: To lead you to the nuptial porch,
line_2: Or grant that Hymen lights his torch,
